name: Are ya winning son? (ItsNotAGoodTime, fluffycatty, TheAyshe, Yuki, Aydaze)
name_original: Are ya winning son? (ItsNotAGoodTime, fluffycatty, TheAyshe, Yuki, Aydaze)
description:
Edit: sorry we ran out of time to put controls on screen

A + D: move 

LMB: interact

A game about becoming a dad. There are 3 endings btw.

This is our submission for Aotearoa Game Jam 2022. The theme was "transition", so we made a game about the transition from child to adult as you gain more responsibilities.

Team:

Jashon Brown
Sweet sweet programming stuff.

Gareth - TheAyshe
Professional improviser.

Yuki - yukifuyuki
Sweet sweet programming stuff.

Arlena -aydaze.art
Character art + animation, graphic design.

Lauryn Dorne
Environment art + animation + rats.

Audio stuff from Hamish Oliver! Thanks, Hamish! :D

Honorable Mentions:
Emotional support from littlejeffy, ella and zolrain, sugoiyellow, kees, mike, shan, max, travers, ben, tau, finley, chris, cora, david, jackdice, dafreaki, leafturtle, rui, firefox quantum, scott, tom, david, joshua, cassie, alex, jero.
